alert.note: Alert for Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 3:27PM CDT until June 25 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 326 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Saint Paul, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... St. Paul... Saint Paul... Pettigrew... Boston... Dutton... Crosses... Patrick... Combs... Delaney... Brashears... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
